title: 60 MIN (FULL BODY) WALKING CARDIO & STRENGTH WORKOUT! 💪 LOW IMPACT HIIT! 😅
description:
#lowimpactcardio #strengthtraining #over50fitness 

Welcome to this Standing Walking Cardio & Strength Full Body HIIT workout, designed specifically for women over 50! This 60-minute HIIT workout combines 30 minutes of cardio and 25 minutes of strength training, including a standing cooldown and stretch. Perfect for those looking to boost metabolism, improve muscle tone, and increase overall fitness.  This full-body workout is ideal for women who want to stay strong, energized, and fit at any age.  This walking cardio has about 3,000 steps!

We do the hard work for 45 seconds, followed by 15 seconds of rest.  We will repeat some moves after the rest and boost the intensity the second time around!  

There is a short warm up and cooldown in the 30 minute cardio routine, then we take a 30 second rest and go right into the 25 minutes of strength training (with 5 lb weights) which also works in 45 and 15 second intervals and includes a standing stretch and cool down at the end. ￼   Beginners can work with 1, 2 or 3 lb weights or no weights, it will still be an effective workout.

This workout is geared towards an intermediate to advanced level, but beginners are very welcome. I give you options so you can work at your own level, so give it a try! ￼

Why HIIT is Great for Women Over 50:
High-Intensity Interval Training (HIIT) is one of the most effective workouts for women over 50. Why? HIIT workouts involve alternating periods of intense effort with short rest periods, which boosts your heart rate, improves cardiovascular health, and helps to burn fat even after your workout is over (known as the "afterburn" effect). This makes HIIT a time-efficient way to get maximum benefits in a short amount of time—perfect for busy lifestyles.

HIIT also improves muscular endurance, builds lean muscle mass, and supports bone health—all crucial aspects of aging well. Plus, it increases the body’s ability to use oxygen efficiently, improving stamina for daily activities. The combination of cardio and strength in this workout will leave you feeling stronger, more energized, and more confident, while also promoting fat loss and muscle definition.

Whether you’re new to fitness or looking to challenge yourself with a comprehensive, low-impact routine, this workout will help you build endurance, increase flexibility, and promote a healthy heart. I will guide you through every move, ensuring proper form and modifications, making it perfect for all fitness levels.

Join this cardio-strength workout today and take control of your health and wellness. It's time to feel strong, confident, and empowered—no matter your age!  Grab some water and let’s get started!

If you enjoy this workout, please subscribe and hit the notification bell for more great workouts for women over 50.  Your likes, comments and shares are also appreciated, as it helps me know what videos are working for you! Thank you.

Please follow me on my socials:

https://www.facebook.com/carly.mckinlay.92  
https://www.instagram.com/carly_mckinlay/
https://www.tiktok.com/@carlymckinlay13

Disclaimer: Be sure to consult your doctor before beginning this or any exercise program. Not all exercises are suitable for everyone. By engaging in these workouts, you agree that you do so at your own risk, and assume all associated risk of injury.

CHAPTERS:
00:00  INTRO 60 MIN FULL BODY HIIT 
00:35  WARM-UP
03:25  WALKING CARDIO WORKOUT
28:25  CARDIO COOLDOWN
31:07   30 SECOND BREAK
31:37  STRENGTH TRAINING
49:44  COOLDOWN/STRETCH
56:50  EXTRO

#hiitworkout 
#walkingcardio
channelDescription:
I’m so glad you found my lifestyle channel! 

I love to share my passions for FITNESS, FASHION, FOOD & FUN!  That's the '4' in Crazy 4 Carly.  I'm actually Crazy 4 You! 

I am a certified fitness instructor and offer doable, fun, multi level and safe, home fitness workouts for 'mature' women and men, 45-75 years and beyond.  I love to inspire you to help you achieve your health and fitness goals!  

I include some meditation videos as well.  The benefits of meditation on mental health, complements the physical health I like to promote. 

I also have a passion for fashion so I love to share fun fashion hacks and tips.  And more food tips coming soon!

My mandate:  Life should always be a fun, positive, beautifully healthy and fabulous experience! 

I appreciate you working out with me. 🤗

Let’s get and stay fit together and have some fun!  Let's get started!
